definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
juice box/drink in a carton/Tetra Pak drink

sentences.english: Popular cold-weather beverages also can be packed with calories, fat and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 冬季里流行的饮品也富含卡路里，脂肪和糖分。

sentences.english: All our drinks come with whole milk, unless you ordred something different. We also offer nonfat milk.
sentences.chinese: 所有饮品均选用全脂奶，你可选择脱脂奶。

sentences.english: Yerba Mate is a natural source of nourishment, which helps maintain all round good health.
sentences.chinese: 马黛茶是一种天然的健康饮品，拥有显著的保健功效。

sentences.english: A few drops of a detection liquid are placed on a pad that has been dipped into a drink.
sentences.chinese: 滴几滴这种测试液在浸过饮品的小垫上。

sentences.english: Dual cup holders are extra-deep and angled to keep drinks upright.
sentences.chinese: 双层杯托是加深的，转变角度保持饮品直立。

sentences.english: Be sure all the beverage accord with hygiene standard and serve them with a standard temperature .
sentences.chinese: 保证所有的饮品符合卫生标准并按照标准温度服务。

sentences.english: Cucumber Juice is a popular healthy drinks.
sentences.chinese: 黄瓜汁是广受欢迎的健康饮品。

sentences.english: How often do you purchase Herbal Tea Series drinks?
sentences.chinese: 你一个月会买多少次鸿福堂的凉茶系列的饮品？

sentences.english: Balanced nutrition for supplemental use with or between meals and for interim sole-source feeding.
sentences.chinese: 可在两餐之间饮用，作为补充营养饮品。

sentences.english: In fact, two very popular beverages have crystalline fructose (sugar) as the second ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，两种流行饮品把结晶果糖作为其第二种原料。

sentences.english: The 21st century's drink developed by this factory has already been in mass production.
sentences.chinese: 本饮料厂研制的二十一世纪饮品已投入批量生产。

sentences.english: It is a motivation like food or drink.
sentences.chinese: 像食物和饮品一样的动力。

sentences.english: It's illegal either to produce or consume alcohol in Libya.
sentences.chinese: 在利比亚，制造和购买酒精类饮品都是非法的。

sentences.english: Popular all over Brazil, Guaraná drinks are the pride of the country.
sentences.chinese: 这种饮品流行于巴西是国家的骄傲。

sentences.english: A smooth, fruity drink thats a sure-fire hit with the ladies.
sentences.chinese: 温和，水果饮品，一定会受女士们得喜欢。

sentences.english: Today, coffee is the most popular drink in the world.
sentences.chinese: 今天，咖啡成为世界上最为流行的饮品。
